955 Exclusive— ‘Should Never Happen Anywhere in This Country’: Zeldin Reflects on 2 Months Since Kirk’s Assassination, Slams Radical Dems (www.breitbart.com) posted 2 days ago by Trump2024Train 31 comments award share report block Exclusive— Zeldin Reflects on 2 Months Since Kirk’s Assassination, Slams Radical Democrats Two months after the public assassination of TPUSA founder Charlie Kirk, EPA Administrator Lee Zeldin spoke of the grim anniversary. www.breitbart.com
31 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Around the Web One Piece Kills All Parasites in Your Body! Paratoxil MySidesGoUp 21 points 2 days ago Charlie was sacrificed for noticing. With all the issues with global govt distrust, compromised food, unfettered immigration….but they continue to role out new antisemitism policies. Really makes you think-  if you have half a brain… permalink award report block reply redredwine 10 points 1 day ago Candace Owns is now the #1 podcast in the world. Noticing has become normalized. The Great Noticing is upon us. permalink parent award report block reply Gayguy420 3 points 1 day ago Is she really? That is sad how many people are eating up her bs permalink parent award report block reply Mitch_WerBell_III 1 points 1 day ago Pretty much.  Israel is a Pomeranian.  We own it, it barks, it will stop barking if we smack it on the nose. permalink parent award report block reply hansgruber7 1 points 1 day ago She has obviously gone crazy. permalink parent award report block reply YT45 2 points 1 day ago She really has, unfortunately.  Her takes on Charlie’s assassination have been off-the-wall batshit. However (and I say this as a guy who doesn’t jump on the “It’s the JOOOOOZ!!!!” bandwagon), Candace seemed pretty legit and levelheaded before she went to Daily Wire and had the resulting spat.  Since then, she’s been increasingly off the deep end.  It makes me wonder just what the hell Shapiro and Boreing did to her while she was there. permalink parent award report block reply view 3 more comments... hansgruber7 1 points 1 day ago Candace has gone nuts.  That's the great noticing.  Her mental illness. permalink parent award report block reply NoticesBugleOWO 0 points 1 day ago She's a fucking retard. We cannot afford to let them gain power ever again. If our representatives in government won't go all out to prevent it, then it's incumbent on us. Prepare for that inevitability. We have 1-3 years depending on how this shakes out. And don't think for a second that the left won't get even more violent if they lose in the mid-terms, because they will. permalink parent award report block reply MySidesGoUp -2 points 1 day ago Well we’re fucked then.
